mapper.insert: insert into auth_operation_code (id, service_id, name, code, memo, path, controller, request_method) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update auth_operation_code set service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, controller = #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_method = #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, service_id, name, code, memo, path, controller, request_method from auth_operation_code
